name: Keen Terradora II Open Toe Sandals - Women's
description:
Give your feet a breath of fresh air. From urban trails to nature's wilder side, these rugged sandals are built to support you. They have a soft and flexible midsole, so every step on the trail feels light and cushioned.Adjustable tubular webbing closes with a top buckle with Velcro® toe closure.Quick-dry foam lining suits watersports and warm weather use.EVA midsole is light and provides excellent cushioning.Multi-directional lugs offer great traction on the trail.Keen All-Terrain rubber outsole is grippy and durable.

        Sustainability
